column6: Intermediate Course in a Less Commonly Taught Language II
column7: Intermediate or intensive language instruction in a selected less commonly taught language. May be repeated with approval. Prerequisite: Consent of instructor. May be repeated in separate semesters, if topics vary. Prerequisite: Departmental approval is required.
column9: May be repeated in separate semesters, if topics vary. Prerequisite: Departmental approval is required.
